title: 全球人工智能立法动态和治理趋势：2026 年政策格局扫描
description: 全球人工智能立法进入密集调整期！
titleZh: 全球人工智能立法动态和治理趋势：2026 年政策格局扫描
titleEn: Global AI Legislation Dynamics and Governance Trends: A 2026 Policy Landscape Scan
descriptionZh: 全球人工智能立法进入密集调整期！
descriptionEn: Global AI legislation enters a period of intensive adjustment! The EU delays the implementation of high-risk clauses, copyright disputes show signs of easing in the US, Japan, and South Korea, and multiple countries are racing to build computing infrastructure. Regulation seeks a balance between innovation incentives and risk control, with international cooperation becoming key to breaking the deadlock.

description: 诺贝尔奖获得者杰弗里·辛顿在最近的一次演讲中明确表示：AI看到的世界与我们的世界完全不同。
titleZh: 辛顿：人工智能就像“外星人”到来，人类的第一课是学会共存
titleEn: Hinton: AI is Like "Aliens" Have Arrived, Humanity's First Lesson is to Learn to Coexist
descriptionZh: 诺贝尔奖获得者杰弗里·辛顿在最近的一次演讲中明确表示：AI看到的世界与我们的世界完全不同。
descriptionEn: Nobel laureate Geoffrey Hinton clearly stated in a recent speech: The world AI sees is completely different from ours.

title: 重塑人工智能时代的搜索可见性和内容营销
description: GEO是一种新兴的营销优化策略。
titleZh: 重塑人工智能时代的搜索可见性和内容营销
titleEn: Reshaping Search Visibility and Content Marketing in the AI Era
descriptionZh: GEO是一种新兴的营销优化策略。
descriptionEn: GEO is an emerging marketing optimization strategy. Based on the technical principle of information cognition-answer output of LLMs, it optimizes content to make brand or product information easier for generative AI engines to capture, understand, reference, and present in AI-generated answers.

title: 了解巴菲特对谷歌的“迟到票”，有助于理解字节跳动、阿里、腾讯的AI门户之战
description: 这两件事的本质都是生态系统竞争力的重新排序。
titleZh: 了解巴菲特对谷歌的“迟到票”，有助于理解字节跳动、阿里、腾讯的AI门户之战
titleEn: Understanding Buffett's "Late Ticket" to Google Helps Understand the AI Portal Battle Among ByteDance, Alibaba, and Tencent
descriptionZh: 这两件事的本质都是生态系统竞争力的重新排序。
descriptionEn: The essence of both matters is a reordering of ecosystem competitiveness.
